text.content: AD 9: Time Angle
Headline:
Your Time Is Worth More Than Sorting Leads
PI ATTORNEYS: How much is your time worth?

Every hour your team spends sorting junk leads is an hour not spent on billable work.

Every consultation with an unqualified prospect is time stolen from real cases.

Every follow-up on a dead lead is opportunity cost.

What if you got that time back?

We handle the entire front end. We fund the marketing. We generate demand. We qualify. We close. You receive signed cases.

~$2,000 average cost per signed case.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

Buy back your time. Receive signed cases.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "YOUR TIME IS WORTH MORE THAN SORTING LEADS" with clock icon. CENTER: Two paths. LEFT (red): "LEAD MODEL" showing clock draining, tasks stacking "Sort leads" "Chase duds" "Bad consultations". RIGHT (blue): "OUR MODEL" showing clean path "Signed cases delivered" with time freed up. BOTTOM: "Buy back your time. Receive signed cases." with "~$2K per case" in #3399FF. DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.
AD 10: Comparison Angle
Headline:
TV Ads: $50K/month. Billboards: $30K. Us: $2K per signed case.
PI ATTORNEYS: Let's talk about what you're actually paying for cases.

TV advertising: $50,000/month minimum. No guarantee on cases.

Billboards: $30,000/month. Brand awareness, maybe.

Lead vendors: $200-$500 per lead. 5% close rate = $4,000+ per case.

Us: ~$2,000 per signed case. Period.

No monthly commitments. No wasted spend. No hoping.

You pay for signed retainers. We handle everything else.

~$2,000 average cost per signed case.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

The math is simple.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "THE REAL COST COMPARISON" in bold white. CENTER: Side-by-side comparison bars. TV ADS: $50K/mo (tall red bar), BILLBOARDS: $30K/mo (medium red bar), LEAD VENDORS: $4K+/case (red bar), KURIOS: $2K/case (short blue glowing bar). Checkmark on Kurios only. BOTTOM: "The math is simple." with pricing in #3399FF. DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, photos, emojis.
AD 11: Burnout Angle
Headline:
Your Team Is Exhausted. Here's Why.
PI ATTORNEYS: Your intake team isn't lazy. They're burnt out.

Calling 100 leads to find 5 real cases is soul-crushing work.

Hearing "I already have a lawyer" 20 times a day breaks motivation.

Chasing people who don't remember filling out a form destroys morale.

Your team didn't sign up to be professional garbage sorters.

What if they only talked to qualified, interested prospects ready to sign?

That's what we deliver. Signed cases. No sorting required.

~$2,000 average cost per signed case.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

Give your team work worth doing.

PROMPT: Near-black (#1A1A1A) background. TOP: "YOUR TEAM IS EXHAUSTED. HERE'S WHY." CENTER: Overwhelmed intake worker with stacks of rejected leads around them. Counter showing "100 calls ‚Üí 5 cases". Crossed out phrases: "Already have a lawyer" "Don't remember filling form" "Not injured". CONTRAST: Clean desk with single "SIGNED CASE" document in blue glow. BOTTOM: "Give your team work worth doing." DO NOT INCLUDE: rounded corners, warm colors, actual people, emojis.
NOTHING ADS (12-14)
Minimal style ‚Äî headline + URL only. No body copy. High performer in current campaign ($78 CPA).

AD 12: Stop Buying Leads. Start Receiving Cases.
AD 13: PI Attorneys: Signed Cases Delivered
AD 14: Signed MVA Cases ‚Äî ~$2k Average

(No body copy ‚Äî headline + link to kuriosbrand.com only)

PROMPT (Nothing Style): Near-black (#1A1A1A) background, extremely minimal. Single line of clean white sans-serif text perfectly centered: "[HEADLINE]". Thin #3399FF underline beneath text. Very subtle grid/data texture in background, barely visible. Nothing else. Extreme minimalism. Square format. DO NOT INCLUDE: logos, decorations, images, icons, any other text, any other elements. Just the text and underline on dark background.
üéØ Launch Recommendations

TIER 1 (Launch First):
‚Ä¢ AD 1: Quality Volume ‚Äî Proven winner angle
‚Ä¢ AD 4: Vendor Secret ‚Äî Strong differentiation
‚Ä¢ AD 7: Rage Bait ‚Äî Emotional hook
‚Ä¢ AD 12-14: Nothing Ads ‚Äî Low CPA performers

TIER 2 (Test Next):
‚Ä¢ AD 6: Top Firms Quiet ‚Äî FOMO angle
‚Ä¢ AD 8: FOMO ‚Äî Urgency driver
‚Ä¢ AD 10: Comparison ‚Äî Clear value prop

TIER 3 (Rotate In):
‚Ä¢ AD 2, 3, 5, 9, 11 ‚Äî Supporting angles
